name: Advent Heroes
description:
The discovery of Runeria was just the beginning. A commitment forged with a renowned mystic arts master bodes ill for all if left unfulfilled, as the guardians of the newly discovered world face undue threat from the unnamed scourge. But the forces of evil have begun to descend upon their point of arrival, forcing evac to a remote settlement where citizens rarely leave or allow outside access for the concern of exposing themselves. And the undue threat has begun to encroach upon even the sacred guardians themselves, risking all that is known to serve a false interpretation of the Great Advent itself.

What to Expect

CLASSIC DESIGN: A full, retro-style roleplay experience with gameplay and presentation echoing the greatest tales ever told.

FIGHT TO SURVIVE: Balance lifeforce and mana charge against your resources in choosing attack skills over party protection.

SHOW NO MERCY: Charge up your advent essence and cut loose with special abilities that can turn the tide back in your favor.

RESTORE ORDER: From an exile by consequence to an ominous dark threat, any situation is fair game for a decisive resolution.
